attributes.contentHtml: Giyu and another reason i havent made a thread before is i was trying to help him fix the problems in his host but since hes too stubborn to fix anything and decides to throw me under the bus and makes me take his blame which is ofc unprofessional and a bad service so yes it is applicable

attributes.title: HostingRemade | Dchu096 | unprofessional | lazy staff team | bad services
